channel.title: Packages on The Emacs Cat
channel.description: Recent content in Packages on The Emacs Cat

item.title: Reverso Context in Emacs
item.description: If you are an emacser, you are probably already following the Sacha Chua’s blog. If you are not, you should. Sacha maintains an incredible blog on Emacs-related news, upcoming events, Org Mode, configuration, new packages, and many other things from the Emacs world.
